nodes.text: Erkeere Ridge was a mountain range that bisected the largest continent on the planet Auratera. Meandering from the north pole to the planet's south pole, the Erkeere was an unbroken chain of tall, mountains that resembled a maw of teeth from space. The tallest mountain, Dran's Peak, was a ritualistic site used by the Sith Empire visiting the nearby vergence at Acablas.
